meaningMnemonic: There are <radical>nine</radical> <radical>car</radical>s all driving in the same place. With so many cars driving in the same place, they create a <kanji>rut</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: To get out of the rut you have to put in a second <reading>key</reading> (き) that turns on the thrusters. You put in the key and press the "take off" button.
